titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 2-year extension of the credit for electricity produced from certain renewable resources.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/9/2009--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend for two years the tax credit for producing electricity from certain renewable resources (e.g., wind, biomass, solar, trash, and hydropower generating facilities).
